column5: 6 ,13w ( replaces 60w incadescent)  compact Flourescent lamps for $reqular price of 13.99 $6 off coupon at the cash and Rona matches that with an additional $6  equals 6 bulbs for 1.99 ( plus tax) good deal!  dave
Do you know what make the bulbs are?
Are they the newer kind that turn on instantly or the older type with a delay?
Globe !  (Cheapies  ) and I imagine they take a few seconds to warm up . Wouldn't want to use them outstide. TB
I am taking out all cfl in my house for the few pennies i save on hydro, then you have to take the burned out bulb in for hazourdous waste for the mercury content in the bulb.
One of the benfits of the CF  is they last a long time .  tracklights with Halogen bulbs , constantly replacing , with CF par lamps  18 months before the first one failed.  TB
Yah but the eye doctors are gonna make a killing off us from using those lightless wonders. Can't stand them...
gotta admit I only use them in crawl space , closets and the like. It takes some trial and error to get the right lamp.  TB
